content.prompt: In the eighth through the twelfth paragraphs (“Hi, Vera . . . slyly”), the fact that the farmer converses only with the shopkeeper suggests that Mrs. Chandler is

choices.label: unsure of herself in social situations
isolated socially from the rest of the town

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
